description: [Saint Bot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1018) will use the malicious file slideshow.mp4 if present to load the core API provided by ntdll.dll to avoid any hooks placed on calls to the original ntdll.dll file by endpoint detection and response or antimalware software.(Citation: Palo Alto Unit 42 OutSteel SaintBot February 2022 )

external_references.description: Unit 42. (2022, February 25). Spear Phishing Attacks Target Organizations in Ukraine, Payloads Include the Document Stealer OutSteel and the Downloader SaintBot. Retrieved June 9, 2022.
external_references.source_name: Palo Alto Unit 42 OutSteel SaintBot February 2022
